text: @realDonaldTrump It's amazing how you deviate from the issues. Last week it was Obamagate and this week it Tweeter. You haven't mentioned anything about Covid-19 lately. I guess that problem got shoved under the rug. Even though some of the things you were writing should have been FACT CHECKED.
